FAQ.title: FAQs

sections.heading: 1. Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to [Your Website Name], we are a platform focused on writing YouTube video scripts. This Terms of Service Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the 'Agreement') governs your use of the [Your Website Name] service.

sections.heading: 2. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using [Your Website Name], you agree to accept all the terms and conditions of this Agreement.

sections.heading: 3. Service Description
sections.content: [Your Website Name] provides an online script writing service to help users create high-quality scripts for YouTube videos.

sections.heading: 4. User Qualifications
sections.content: You must be at least 13 years old to use our service.

sections.heading: 5. Account Security
sections.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and restricting access to your account.

sections.heading: 6. User Conduct
sections.content: You agree not to use our service for any illegal activities, disrupt our service, or engage in any conduct that may damage our reputation.

sections.heading: 7. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content and materials of [Your Website Name], including but not limited to text, scripts, images, designs, are our intellectual property.

sections.heading: 8. Modification of Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify the terms of service at any time, and these modifications will be effective upon posting.

sections.heading: 9. Termination of Service
sections.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend the service at any time, without prior notice.

sections.heading: 10. Disclaimer
sections.content: [Your Website Name] does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, special, or consequential damages.

sections.heading: 11. Applicable Law and Dispute Resolution
sections.content: This Agreement is governed by the laws of [Your Country/Region], and any disputes shall be submitted to the courts of [Your Country/Region] for resolution.
